00080 void CreateAttributeFinishButtons( void )
00081 {
00082 
00083       // this procedure will create the buttons needed for the attribute finish screen
00084       
00085       // the yes button
00086   giIMPAttributeFinishButtonImage[0]=  LoadButtonImage( "LAPTOP\\button_2.sti" ,-1,0,-1,1,-1 );
00087 /*    giIMPAttributeFinishButton[0] = QuickCreateButton( giIMPAttributeFinishButtonImage[0], LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X +  ( 90 ), LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y + ( 224 ),
00088                                                             BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST - 1,
00089                                                             BtnGenericMouseMoveButtonCallback, (GUI_CALLBACK)BtnIMPAttributeFinishYesCallback );
00090 
00091 */
00092        giIMPAttributeFinishButton[0] = CreateIconAndTextButton(  giIMPAttributeFinishButtonImage[0], pImpButtonText[ 20 ], FONT12ARIAL, 
00093                                                                                      FONT_WHITE, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00094                                                                                      FONT_WHITE, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00095                                                                                      TEXT_CJUSTIFIED, 
00096                                                                                      LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X +  ( 130 ), LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y + ( 180 ), BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00097                                                                                           BtnGenericMouseMoveButtonCallback, (GUI_CALLBACK)BtnIMPAttributeFinishYesCallback );
00098 
00099       // the no button
00100   giIMPAttributeFinishButtonImage[1]=  LoadButtonImage( "LAPTOP\\button_2.sti" ,-1,0,-1,1,-1 );
00101 /*    giIMPAttributeFinishButton[1] = QuickCreateButton( giIMPAttributeFinishButtonImage[1], LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X +  ( 276 ), LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y + ( 224 ),
00102                                                             BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST - 1,
00103                                                             BtnGenericMouseMoveButtonCallback, (GUI_CALLBACK)BtnIMPAttributeFinishNoCallback );
00104 */
00105        giIMPAttributeFinishButton[1] = CreateIconAndTextButton(  giIMPAttributeFinishButtonImage[1], pImpButtonText[ 21 ], FONT12ARIAL, 
00106                                                                                      FONT_WHITE, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00107                                                                                      FONT_WHITE, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00108                                                                                      TEXT_CJUSTIFIED, 
00109                                                                                      LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X +  ( 130 ), LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y + ( 264 ), BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00110                                                                                           BtnGenericMouseMoveButtonCallback, (GUI_CALLBACK)BtnIMPAttributeFinishNoCallback);
00111 
00112   SetButtonCursor(giIMPAttributeFinishButton[0], CURSOR_WWW);
00113       SetButtonCursor(giIMPAttributeFinishButton[1], CURSOR_WWW);
00114   
00115 
00116 
00117   return;
00118 
00119 }

00122 void DestroyAttributeFinishButtons( void )
00123 {
00124 
00125       // this procedure will destroy the buttons for the attribute finish screen
00126 
00127       // the yes  button
00128   RemoveButton(giIMPAttributeFinishButton[ 0 ] );
00129   UnloadButtonImage(giIMPAttributeFinishButtonImage[ 0 ] );
00130 
00131       // the no  button
00132   RemoveButton(giIMPAttributeFinishButton[ 1 ] );
00133   UnloadButtonImage(giIMPAttributeFinishButtonImage[ 1 ] );
00134 
00135       return;
00136 }

00139 void BtnIMPAttributeFinishYesCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00140 {
00141 
00142       // btn callback for IMP personality quiz answer button
00143       if (!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED))
00144             return;
00145 
00146   if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00147       {
00148              btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
00149       }
00150       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00151       {
00152             if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
00153             {
00154       btn->uiFlags&=~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
00155       // gone far enough
00156               iCurrentImpPage = IMP_MAIN_PAGE;
00157 //            if( iCurrentProfileMode < IMP__PORTRAIT )
00158                   if( !CameBackToAttributesPageButNotFinished() )
00159                   {
00160         iCurrentProfileMode = IMP__FINISH;//IMP__PORTRAIT;
00161                   }
00162               // if we are already done, leave
00163           if( iCurrentProfileMode == IMP__FINISH)
00164                   {
00165             iCurrentImpPage = IMP_FINISH;
00166                   }
00167                   
00168                   // SET ATTRIBUTES NOW
00169                   SetGeneratedCharacterAttributes( );
00170                   fButtonPendingFlag = TRUE;
00171             }
00172       }
00173 }
00174 
00175 BOOLEAN CameBackToAttributesPageButNotFinished()
00176 {
00177       //if we are in a page that comes after this one
00178       if( iCurrentProfileMode == IMP__PERSONALITY ||
00179                   iCurrentProfileMode == IMP__VOICE )
00180       {
00181             return( TRUE );
00182       }
00183       else
00184       {
00185             return( FALSE );
00186       }
00187 }
00188 
00189 void BtnIMPAttributeFinishNoCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00190 {
00191 
00192       // btn callback for IMP personality quiz answer button
00193       if (!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED))
00194             return;
00195 
00196       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00197       {
00198              btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
00199       }
00200       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00201       {
00202             if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
00203             {
00204       btn->uiFlags&=~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
00205             // if no, return to attribute
00206             iCurrentImpPage = IMP_ATTRIBUTE_PAGE;
00207             fReturnStatus = TRUE;
00208             fButtonPendingFlag = TRUE;
00209             }
00210       }
00211 }
